channel.title: HELP NEEDED! ~ How to make a new HOME?
channel.description: How to make a new home on ur server? And how can i add things like a bank or thieving stall in it? Please help!

item.title: HELP NEEDED! ~ How to make a new HOME?
item.dc:creator: @Fatal_Desire Fatal Desire
item.description:
@Fatal_Desire wrote:

  1. For the Home search “Home” in your client.java until you find the coords or your home. Then change to the coords of the place you want.

  2. For banks and thieving stalls you have to make global object. This is what code looks like. Search makeglobalobject and you should find it. First 2 numbers are coords and the next one is object ID. The Next number is which way you want facing then you can prob leave the rest the same. Goodluck!

Read full topic
item.source: HELP NEEDED! ~ How to make a new HOME?
